A trial of lenalidomide, bendamustine and rituximab recently documented a complete response rate of 64%, with molecular MRD negativity reached in 34% patients. Toxicity, however, was greater than with the RiBVD regimen, with infectious grade 3-5 toxicities seen in 42% of the 51 recruited patients.
13 Two large phase III trials of BR ± ibrutinib or BR ± ACP196 (acalabrutinib) are still ongoing and results are pending.
